member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_MULTISAMPLE_QUALITY_LEVELS
member.summary: Describes the multi-sampling image quality levels for a given format and sample count.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_MULTISAMPLE_QUALITY_LEVELS.Format
member.summary: A -typed value for the format to return info about.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_MULTISAMPLE_QUALITY_LEVELS.SampleCount
member.summary: The number of multi-samples per pixel to return info about.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_MULTISAMPLE_QUALITY_LEVELS.Flags
member.summary: Flags to control quality levels, as a bitwise-OR'd combination of enumeration constants. The resulting value specifies options for determining quality levels.
